Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class PlayController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.PlayController
public class PlayController extends Object
Controlled used to play the game independently of the model and manage saves

    • pickTiles

      public boolean pickTiles(List<Tile> tiles, String player)
      Perform pick tiles action in game
      Parameters:
      tiles - list of tiles to pick
      player - player who is picking
      Returns:
      true if the pick was successful

    • putTiles

      public boolean putTiles(List<Tile> tiles, int column, String player)
      Perform put tiles action in game
      Parameters:
      tiles - list of tiles to put in player's bookshelf
      column - bookshelf column where to put the tiles
      player - player who is performing the action
      Returns:
      true if the put was successful

    • saveGame

      public boolean saveGame(String name) throws SaveException, IOException
      Save the game
      Parameters:
      name - future name of the save
      Returns:
      true if it was successful
      Throws:
      SaveException - when a save with the same name already exists and overwrite is false
      IOException - when the save folder cannot be created

    • saveGame

      public boolean saveGame(String name, boolean overwrite) throws IOException, SaveException
      Save the game
      Parameters:
      name - future name of the save
      overwrite - true if the save should overwrite an existing one
      Returns:
      true if it was successful
      Throws:
      SaveException - when a save with the same name already exists and overwrite is false
      IOException - when the save folder cannot be created

    • leave

      public boolean leave(String player)
      Method to make leave the game a player
      Parameters:
      player - player name (can be passed also a player name that doesn't exist)
      Returns:
      true if the disconnection ended well. false if the player doesn't exist
